text:
BREAKING: Google is now better than ChatGPT*.

*to generate & edit images:

Google just released the new "nano-banana" model inside Gemini (2.5-flash) to generate & edit images.

I can't believe how good it is:
✦ Perfect edit, almost Photoshop-level.
✦ Never changes the original part of my picture.
✦ It will disrupt leader SaaS in the coming weeks.

I will make a mega newsletter on it at howtoai.guide.

Join 120,000+ readers for free.
